Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict that the Detroit Pistons will win against the Charlotte Hornets.
The Pistons have improved their defense under new coach J.B. Bickerstaff, allowing an average of 114.6 points per game compared to 119 last season.
Cade Cunningham, the No. 1 pick in the 2021 draft, is averaging 23.8 points and 9.7 assists this season, both personal bests.
The Pistons have won four of their last five games and are currently in ninth place in the Eastern Conference standings.
Charlotte Hornets have not made much progress under their new head coach, Charles Lee, and have lost eight straight games before the matchup with Detroit.
